  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Implement a given interface in a given path. If the first argument is "-jar" the implemented class will be in a jar. First argument is optional "-jar", second argument must be an interface name that will be implemented, third arguments is path where put the implemented class
      Parameters:
      args - array of arguments

    • implement

      public void implement(Class<?> token, Path root) throws ImplerException
      Description copied from interface: Impler
      Produces code implementing class or interface specified by provided token.

      Generated class' name should be the same as the class name of the type token with Impl suffix added. Generated source code should be placed in the correct subdirectory of the specified root directory and have correct file name. For example, the implementation of the interface List should go to $root/java/util/ListImpl.java

      Specified by:
      implement in interface Impler
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for.
      root - root directory.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - when implementation cannot be generated.

    • implementJar

      public void implementJar(Class<?> token, Path jarFile) throws ImplerException
      Description copied from interface: JarImpler
      Produces .jar file implementing class or interface specified by provided token.

      Generated class' name should be the same as the class name of the type token with Impl suffix added.

      Specified by:
      implementJar in interface JarImpler
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for.
      jarFile - target .jar file.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - when implementation cannot be generated.

      Parameters:
      token - a class token that will be compiled
      root - a path to class that will be compiled
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if couldn't get JavaCompiler or compilation failed

      Parameters:
      token - a class token, that was compiled
      root - a path to a compiled class
      jarFile - a path to a jarFile
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if IOException throws while writing

      root - a path for relative
      extension - an extension of file
      Returns:
      the relative path from root to the class file
